title: Quantity of ice cream consumed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 - 2012 , by age
summary: Overall Consumption in grams has decreased over the Year.
Consumption in grams is slightly decreasing from 4-10_years to 65_years_and_over.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 4-10_years and 65_years_and_over.
The highest Consumption in grams, of value 13.0 was reached at Year 4-10_years
The lowest Consumption in grams, of value 7.0 was reported at Year 65_years_and_over
min_summary: In general Consumption in grams has fallen over the Year.
